name: Zombeer, Zombies & Beers
description:
Zombeer, Zombies & Beers is an action-shooter game developed by Moonbite Games. It was originally released in 2015. U&I Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Zombeer, Zombies & Beers on PC, PlayStation 3, Xbox 360 and Classic Macintosh.
